languages.text: {n}Обитатели ульев, недавно наблюдавшие суровую расправу над малыми культами, охотно поддержали блюстителей — урок покорности был усвоен, и добровольцы надеялись на право поучаствовать в грабеже побежденных.{/n}

{n}The inhabitants of the hives readily threw their support behind the enforcers after watching them severely punish the minor cults — the lesson in obedience had been learned, and the volunteers hoped to obtain some spoils from the losing side.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обитатели ульев, недавно наблюдавшие суровую расправу над малыми культами, охотно поддержали блюстителей — урок покорности был усвоен, и добровольцы надеялись на право поучаствовать в грабеже побежденных.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The inhabitants of the hives readily gave their support to the enforcers after watching them severely punishing the minor cults — the lesson in obedience has been learned, and the volunteers hoped to get an opportunity to rob the losing side.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当巢都居民看到执法者严厉地惩处小型教派之后，立刻向那些执法者提供了支持。人们已经学到了服从，而自愿参战的人们也希望能从战败者那里缴获一部分战利品。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inhabitants of the hives readily threw their support behind the enforcers after watching them severely punish the minor cults — the lesson in obedience had been learned, and the volunteers hoped to obtain some spoils from the losing side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当巢都居民看到执法者严厉地惩处小型教派之后，立刻向那些执法者提供了支持。人们已经学到了服从，而自愿参战的人们也希望能从战败者那里缴获一部分战利品。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los habitantes de las colmenas no dudaron en apoyar al personal de seguridad tras ver cómo castigaban duramente a los cultos menores: la lección de obediencia estaba aprendida, y los voluntarios esperaban obtener algún botín del bando perdedor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inhabitants of the hives readily threw their support behind the enforcers after watching them severely punish the minor cults — the lesson in obedience had been learned, and the volunteers hoped to obtain some spoils from the losing side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los habitantes de las colmenas no dudaron en apoyar al personal de seguridad tras ver cómo castigaban duramente a los cultos menores: la lección de obediencia estaba aprendida, y los voluntarios esperaban obtener algún botín del bando perdedor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハイヴの住人たちは、エンフォーサーが少数派魔女団を厳しく罰するのを見て、すぐに支持表明をした...志願者らは、従順に従うことから教訓を学び、負けた側から戦利品を手に入れようと目論んでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inhabitants of the hives readily threw their support behind the enforcers after watching them severely punish the minor cults — the lesson in obedience had been learned, and the volunteers hoped to obtain some spoils from the losing side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハイヴの住人たちは、エンフォーサーが少数派魔女団を厳しく罰するのを見て、すぐに支持表明をした...志願者らは、従順に従うことから教訓を学び、負けた側から戦利品を手に入れようと目論んでいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les habitants des ruches se rangent aux côtés des prévôts, après les avoir vus réprimer violemment les cultes mineurs. Ils ont compris la leçon, les volontaires espérant obtenir une part de au butin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inhabitants of the hives readily threw their support behind the enforcers after watching them severely punish the minor cults — the lesson in obedience had been learned, and the volunteers hoped to obtain some spoils from the losing side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les habitants des ruches se rangent aux côtés des prévôts, après les avoir vus réprimer violemment les cultes mineurs. Ils ont compris la leçon, les volontaires espérant obtenir une part de au butin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Bewohner der Makropolen unterstützten sofort die Enforcers, nachdem sie gesehen hatten, wie brutal diese die kleineren Kulte bestraften. Die Lektion in Gehorsam war angekommen, und die Freiwilligen hofften auch auf ein wenig Kriegsbeute.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inhabitants of the hives readily threw their support behind the enforcers after watching them severely punish the minor cults — the lesson in obedience had been learned, and the volunteers hoped to obtain some spoils from the losing side.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Bewohner der Makropolen unterstützten sofort die Enforcers, nachdem sie gesehen hatten, wie brutal diese die kleineren Kulte bestraften. Die Lektion in Gehorsam war angekommen, und die Freiwilligen hofften auch auf ein wenig Kriegsbeute.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kovanların sakinleri, ufak çaplı tarikatları ağır bir şekilde cezalandırdıklarını görmelerinin ardından infazcılara desteklerini canıgönülden sundular. İtaatkârlığa dair gereken ders verilmişti. Gönüllüler ise kaybeden tarafa ait birkaç ganimet toplayabileceklerini ummuşlardı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inhabitants of the hives readily threw their support behind the enforcers after watching them severely punish the minor cults — the lesson in obedience had been learned, and the volunteers hoped to obtain some spoils from the losing side.{/n}
